name: hello-perl-psgi
description: A simple Perl PSGI example application

scripts.build: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib && eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib) && cpanm -vn --installdeps .
scripts.start: eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib) ; echo -n "plackup location: " $(which plackup) ; plackup --server Twiggy --port 3000 scripts/index.psgi
